job.command: cd ${SUBMITTINGDIRECTORY} setenv STARFPE NO setenv NODEBUG yes starver .DEV2 setup 64b ln -s $STAR/.sl* . # cd $SCRATCH # pwd # setenv NODEBUG yes # setup gcc # setup 32b # starver DEV2/SL15 set input = $INPUTFILE0; set dir = `echo ${input} | awk -F\: '{print $1}'` set tag = `basename ${dir}`; set log = ${tag}B.log set pico = ${tag}.picoDst.root # if (-r ${log}) exit 0; test -r ${pico} if (! $? ) exit 0 root.exe -q -b -x 'lMuDst.C(-1,"'${dir}'/*.MuDst.root","RMuDst,mysql,magF,nodefault,picoWrite,quiet",0,"'${pico}'")' makePicoDst.C+ >& ${log}
